column2: p <- read_tsv("Metatranscriptome/Merged_Quant.sf") %>%  # read merged file from salmon (gene expr in TPM)
separate(col=Gene, c("Bin", NA), sep = "_[01]", remove = TRUE) %>% # add column with bin name (from gene name)
group_by(Bin) %>% summarise_all(funs(sum)) %>% ungroup() %>% # summarise counts at bin level
gather("Sample", "Abundance", 2:ncol(.)) %>% left_join(metadata) %>% # create data frame for ggplot2

mutate(text = paste0("x: ", Bin, "
", "y: ", Sample, "
", "Value: ",Abundance, "
")) %>%# mess around with plotly
ggplot(aes(x=Bin, y=Sample, fill=log10(Abundance+1), text=text)) + # plot with ggplot!
